website_summaries.verdict: If you need something extra-adorable to brighten up your keys, a cat sandwiched inside a lemon macaroon or stretching through a doughnut is a sweet option.
pros: 8 colorful keychains featuring cats lounging on baked goods
Equal chance of finding doughnut, macaroon, cupcake, and coffee cats

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: I got the yellow macaroon cat and they look just like they do in the pictures, however it is a little larger than I thought it would be and A LOT heavier!! I was going to put it on my car keys but I absolutely can not do that. I had it on my purse for awhile but even that added extra weight that I didn't need and before I took it off, it broke off. I had gotten one of the cat sushi one's as well and they are so much lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these cute kitty keychains, one for me and one for a friend, and we love them!! I got a kitty in a cupcake and my friend got one in a donunt! My friend's did break after not too long though. The tail broke off! I dont know what exactly happened there as mine is still perfectly fine hanging on my everyday bag. I do think these were a little on the pricey side for a keychain, but they are super adorable and the perfect way to cute up a purse! I can safely say I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Zuzu

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute, cute and adorable packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I know I didn’t buy the product for the packaging but I’m crazy about the package and the clever attention statement...that made me laugh and shared it with everybody that would listen. The keychain was as advertised and I got compliments on how cute it is. Can’t wait to get others. The only thing I can say I disliked is that it’s a mystery product and you don’t know which one your getting but they are all adorable. Again thank you for the clever packaging
customer_reviews.author: Uzumaki Romeo

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable. Got three
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. Got three, one for me and my kids. Mine rode on my keychain until it just popped off of the attachment one day. It’s only been a couple of months....
customer_reviews.author: Leslie weiler Meng

customer_reviews.title: So freaking cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Besides the title summing up my general feeling about my keychain, this keychain is rather big. I received the cat-uppcino one and it was bigger than I anticipated. You can see all the details and it is easy to attach to keys or bags. I especially like the variety of options you can get.
customer_reviews.author: mini

customer_reviews.title: Once you buy one you will buy more
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend $8 on a keychain but omg are these boxes a hit with my friends and coworkers! I love mine and want to collect them all!
customer_reviews.author: Christapalooza

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Happy purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are well designed. I got the choco+mint stretching kitty. I unscrewed the keychain screw, so I could rest it on a flat surface. Kittah & donut sit upright perfectly. Cheers! :3 :3
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but.
customer_reviews.text: Revised Review: It is super cute, but I dropped a star because it didn't stay attached to the keyring very well. It does still look cute as a figurine on a shelf though.
customer_reviews.author: ninny8

customer_reviews.title: Only one randomly selected for $$$
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute but I misunderstood the descriptions. I didn’t realize that I was only receiving one for that price along with that it was randomly selected. I was sent two of the same items for an extremely high price!
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonbmichelle317

customer_reviews.title: Cute little key chains
customer_reviews.text: Overall if it’s got a cat on it, I’m all for it. It’s only a plus that I ended up with the cupcake and macaroon cats too but I would’ve loved any of them. I put my spare key onto it and it sets on my computer desk. Love it. Would make a great stocking stuffer/ Easter basket filler whatever little gift for someone who loves cats as much as me. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutie
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 4 of them and have never got a duplicate. They're cute af
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and they are super cute. I use them as decor on my vanity. They are a little too heavy to use as actual key chains.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Kershaw

customer_reviews.title: cute but
customer_reviews.text: Expect a lot of duplicates since they are mystery boxes with not a lot of options.
customer_reviews.author: A&A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loved this gift
customer_reviews.text: I expected her to use the cats on different keychains but she liked them so much they all went on the same one. On the plus side it makes it much easier to find her keys in her purse, just look for all the kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness overload
customer_reviews.text: Highly detailed, larger than expected. Great gift for any cat lover out there!
customer_reviews.author: branden colwell

customer_reviews.title: The best key chain
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! It is so cute! I got the little pink macaroon with adorable black/grey kitten.
customer_reviews.author: karinn

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these and they are the cutest little guys!! Sadly 1 broke in half pretty quickly. Made more for looks and not to actually use as a key chain. Had it on purse and it snapped. So sad because daughter and I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: These little kitties are adorable! They have absolutely amazing detail, and they are so cute on a purse. I recommend this to anyone who likes cute things. This is an amazing buy, and I am happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The name says it all
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these and both were the same thing... it even had the numberof what it was... why would they send two of the same item...I would buy another one because they are so darn cute but I don't dare for fear I would get the same ones I already have
customer_reviews.author: Caveat Emptor

customer_reviews.title: So cute !
customer_reviews.text: I love these and have been adding to my collection. They are good quality and adorable detail.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: What a cute kitty collection item to hang on my wall of animals.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute however, I am worried that it is not very stable I worry about losing part of the cat
customer_reviews.author: Ollie :)

customer_reviews.title: Cute cat, good quality
customer_reviews.text: The paint and molding were both very good quality. I think the product should be about $2 cheaper, but it is a nice keychain.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These are just too cute! My kids love them and I think they are the cutest. Gonna be ordering a few more for christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin flack

customer_reviews.title: An instant hit
customer_reviews.text: Every single one is precious and I’ll definitely be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I got the yellow macaron and white coffee cup. My students love them too.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Pinnell

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend who is an avid feline lover. She loves it! She got the pink macaron/gray cat.
customer_reviews.author: BootyJunk

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters 11th birthday! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Keelan Kolek

customer_reviews.title: Cat lovers dream
customer_reviews.text: I’m a cat person so my review is awesome. Just be careful with keychains they don’t like to much bumping and pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Kzcatluvr

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute. Came exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. Came exactly as expected. My daughter loves Japanese capsule toys and was so excited about this!
customer_reviews.author: N. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Small and cute
customer_reviews.text: Well made and super cute. It's small but I knew that.
customer_reviews.author: coffeedrinker

customer_reviews.title: Cute Cafe Cat
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. Kind of expensive for the size, but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Such a good give for dessert cat lovers everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift and it's exactly as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: ended up being perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone who loves cats and sweets....ended up being perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Voodoomouse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but too heavy for a key holder
customer_reviews.text: They are cute! Good quality, but too heavy for a key holder. Wish they were only figures, not key rings
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I really love these keychains. I really wish I could get the black cat macaroon because it looks like my cat. But I’ve alre ordered 3 so I don’t know if I can get anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I got the pink doughnut cat. I wish it wasn't a keychain, though, however, product was as described, so I knew that before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I adore these cat key chains. It comes with all of the cats as told, they are amazing quality. They don't feel cheap and are quiet durable. I just honestly love them, I defiantly recommend them as a gift for anyone who loves cats.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, husband has it decorating the cat food bin. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister who really loves cats and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Sh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. It's a little bigger and heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Allegra Tedder

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and adorable for attaching to backpacks. 9 yr old girl ignores the keychain and treats them like friends
customer_reviews.author: Sbg

customer_reviews.title: As pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and good quality details. I might order one more later.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for my daughter, except now I want one...
customer_reviews.text: The detail is very nice for something so small. These cute little kitties will steal your heart.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Malone

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up well
customer_reviews.text: This lasted for a couple of weeks or so before it broke in half.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Holston

customer_reviews.title: Cute Cupcake
customer_reviews.text: So cute, I revived the adorable white cat on the chocolate cupcake.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and great for those who love cats and sweets.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun and a change from Sushi Cat. Great stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Found these in Chicago during a trip and only bought one! I regretted it immediately and was (thankfully) able to find them online! Cutest things I've ever seen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty cute but don't be a fool like me and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cute but don't be a fool like me and think you're gonna get all of them. You only get one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool cat keychain
customer_reviews.text: If you love cats and keychains or know someone who does, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Clever Idiots Cafe du Meow Dessert Cat Keychain - Blind Box Includes 1 of 8 Collectable Figurines - Features a Detachable Keyring - Authentic Japanese Design - Durable Plastic
product_meta.description:
Edition:1pc

Give Your Keys an Instant Upgrade!

Whether you need to make your car keys easier to identify or you simply want to give your purse 
some extra flare, keychains add instant personality. Unfortunately, many of them are made with 
heavy, bulky materials that make them uncomfortable to wear and carry.

Cafe du Meow Dessert Cat Keychains are adorably unique yet convenient to carry! Our fun, frisky 
series contains 8 different figurines, each pairing an endearing kitty with a beautiful dessert. It 
includes 2 American shorthair cats with macaroons (pink, yellow), 2 coffee Persian cats (black, 
white), 2 cupcake munchkin cats (blue, cream) and 2 cats stretching through donuts (green, pink).

Each figurine includes a detachable keyring that’s perfect for hooking onto your purse, backpack 
or an ID lanyard! Lightweight and measuring about 1.38in x 1.57in x 0.79in, you can show off 
your style without excess bulk. For added fun, your figurine arrives in a blind mystery box! You 
receive 1 of our 8 designs, allowing you to trade and collect them while enjoying a special surprise.

Unlike our competitors, we’re offering genuine Japanese-designed products! Famously cute and made 
with durable plastic, it’s craftsmanship at its finest. Thanks to beautifully detailed designs, each figurine 
truly comes to life.

Why Choose Our Collectable Keychains?

- Order includes 1of 8 figurines
- Features a detachable keyring
- Blind mystery box for added fun
- Made with durable plastic
- Authentic Japanese design


Our Customer Service Team is Standing By!

*Stock is limited. Order today to ensure availability.

Order Your Keychain Now and Let Your Style Shine!
feature_bullets: Adorable Dessert Cats: Cafe du Meow is where adorable kitties curl up with delectable desserts. Our 8-piece series has macaroon shorthair cats (pink, yellow), coffee Persian cats (black, white), cupcake munchkin cats (blue, cream) and donut cats (green, pink).

Go-Anywhere Kitty Keychain: Thanks to a detachable keyring, you can bring your cat cupcake anywhere you go. Measuring 1.38in x 1.57in x 0.79in, each one is lightweight and compact, making these felines the perfect addition to you purse, backpack or keys.

Surprise Blind Box: When you purchase one of our blind mystery boxes, you receive 1 of our 8 designs. Adding fun surprise to every order, you get to unwrap the mystery. Trade our cool keychains with friends and collect them all to build the complete series.

Trusted Quality: Expertly designed and carefully crafted, these animal toys reflect our commitment to trusted and reliable craftsmanship. Strong plastic ensures long-lasting durability while the beautifully detailed faces give each figurine its own unique charm.

Authentic Japanese Keychains: Clever Idiots is home to hundreds of products imagined and brought to life by Japanese creatives. Our customer service team is knowledgeable and eager to help, so let us know if you have any questions about our unique keychains.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
